title: fitting rooflining at rear by tailgate hinges

posts.content:
Hi,Im fitting a material rooflining to a 11 Window bus, the area around the tailgate hinges , in between the hinge covers is giving me a problem,

Its not clear where the lining fits, Ive looked at pictures , spoke to Chris from Wonderland who told me how to do it ,but it doesnt seem to be simple ,

I would like to look at a bus with a lining in , which would be better than pictures,is there anybody in south midlands that would kindly let me have a look at their bus to confirm where the lining fits .

thanks hopefully ,Doug.
Anywhere in Midlands and south of England , I will bring some doughnuts ! Doug

Any splitscreens in gloucestershire, I live near Tewkesbury, I could look at , only take a few minutes , would appreciate it ,

Thanks Doug
Off to Dubfreeze this sunday, hopefully there will be a bus I can look at , Doug
